text: Ntibibaho k’umugabo yemeye Imana yiwe y’ukuri canke k’umukenyezi yemeye Imana yiwe y’ukuri hamwe n’intumwa yiwe mugihe baciriwe urubanza babe bafise aho bahengamiye kuri urwo rubanza rwabo, nuwu hakana Imana mu kwiyonkora ku Mana hamwe n’intumwa yiwe, mu vy’ukuri uyo muntu azoba yazimiye bimwe biri k’umugaragaro
